TopicTitle: KSP version of "The World Is Just Awesome"

Articles.Content:
This project is now private.

Edited June 27, 2013 by QuadroMan1
Holy crap that would be amazing
Kerbol's Just Awesome! song about all of the Kerbolar System, Kerbin, Duna, Eve, Jool, etc, and all of the Muns
I think it's awesome when Stephen Hawking says Boom De Yadda.

Yes!

DO THIS! MAKE IT HAPPEN.

DO IT

OOOH IDEAS:

I love the mouantians: Kerbal on a mountain on Kerbin.

I love the clear blue sky: Kerbal looking up at the sky on Kerbin.

I love big bridges: the lyrics would have to be changed.

I love when great whites fly: A space plane that looks like a shark.

Whenever they say I love the whole world, show all of Kerbin. And sight and sounds: a ship exploding.

I love the giant squids: Show the dead deep space kraken thats on Bop.

I love to go fast: A spaceship going at VERY high speeds

Boomdiadah? Explosions.

I love the ocean: A kerbal swimming in the ocean

I love real dirty things: At the island runway that was those rusting parts.

I love Egyptian kings: should be changed to "I love Kerbal kings, and show a Kerbal walking around at the temple in the desert.

I love toradeoes: I dont know about this one...

I love arachainds: show a legged rover using some mod or none if some one cane do that.

I love hot magma: show a clip of right before a ship crashes into Kerbol.

Yeah thats almost the hole things so yeah.

'I love big bridges' becomes 'I love big boosters'

'boomdiadah' is many explosions, possibly the pirated nuke mod

'I love tornadoes' release of boosters with fuel still in them (they fly in a circular pattern when released)

I think that should cover everything

I love Mun mountains.

I love the clear red skies.

I love big boosters.

I love when bad planes fly.

I love the universe.

And all its sights and sounds.[Explosions]

Boom De Yada!

Boom De Yada!

And all its craziness

Boom De Yada!

Boom De Yada!

I love arachnids. Scott Manley's Mun walker

I love hot Kerbol. Show Kerbol

I hate the space kraken. show bop with dead kraken on it.

I love the universe.

It's such a brilliant place.

Boom De Yada!
